course_details: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including syntax, data types, and control structures.
Master the C++ programming language, from basics to advanced topics, with hands-on projects.
Build modern websites from scratch using HTML and CSS. Includes responsive design techniques.
Get started with Java programming. Cover basics, object-oriented concepts, and Java SE.
Learn data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python libraries like Pandas and Scikit-Learn.
Create 2D and 3D games using C# and the Unity game engine. Includes physics and animation.
Build interactive and dynamic web applications with JavaScript, DOM manipulation, and AJAX.
Learn to manage and maintain Linux servers, including user management, security, and scripting.
Develop Android apps using Java or Kotlin. Covers UI design, APIs, and publishing on Google Play.
